SELECT penalty_num, to_char(penalty_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regdate_String, penalty_blockcanceldate, penalty_reason, mem_id FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM penalty ORDER BY penalty_regdate DESC)a)
WHERE penalty_blockcanceldate>sysdate AND rnum<=8

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM penalty ORDER BY penalty_regdate DESC)a)
WHERE penalty_blockcanceldate>sysdate AND rnum<=8
